Выберите изучаемый язык и язык приложения. Эти настройки можно будет поменять позднее через меню.\n\nДля некоторых языков готовые коллекции могут не существовать или их может быть недостаточно. Если вам не хватет словарных карточек - создайте их самостоятельно или свяжитесь с авторами программы для ускорения работы.
Сейчас вы можете установить с сервера доступные коллекции слов и выражений английского языка. Позже их можно будет удалить или установить другие через меню.
Не удается подключиться к серверу. Убедитесь, что ваш телефон подключен к Интернету и нажмите кнопку "Обновить". Или пропустите этот шаг и установите коллекции позднее.

Evaluate your knowledge of this card

Learn only the words you need: 

1. Create your own collection 

2. Copy the words you need from the main dictionary there 

3. Run a test on your collection
There are no flashcards matching the test parameters
How about a rating on the Play Market, then?
Whould you mind giving us some feedback?
Choose an application for sending email!
If you need help please watch our tutorial video.

Quixicon is an app made to help you expand your vocabulary in foreign languages using flash cards(http://quixicon.com/en). It is completely free.

Main principles:

• The application is designed for self-education

• Users can decide what words and phrases to study by making up their own collections. Fill them by creating flash cards one by one or by simply copying them from other collections.

• You can test your knowledge of each collection. Decide yourself if your answer is correct.

• Download premade collections from our server or prepare and import your own as a text file. Export collections from the app into a file.

We have a lot of ideas to develop the app. Any of your support will be helpful.

If you like the app, please rate it on Google Play.

If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact us on the website:
http://quixicon.com/en/contact-us.

If you want to support the project, details are here:
http://quixicon.com/en/donate-app.

If you want to help create collections of words for any language, please contact us.

Thank you for downloading the app!

Flashcards contain a word/phrase, transcription and translation. They are a reliable way of memorizing foreign words and expressions. The card can also contain an example of the use of the word.

Cards are grouped into collections (sets of words or phrases). Below are examples of collections. They can be edited - cards can be deleted, added, moved from one collection to another.

You can select studied language in the side menu . Collections created for one language are shown only when it’s selected.

You can create your own collections or import ready-made ones via the "Import Collections" in the side menu.

Cards can be easily copied from one collection to another.

You can test your knowledge of words and expressions from any collection. To do this, you need to press the orange button, which is always in the lower right corner of the screen:

Free collections of words in different languages are available and more will be added with time.

If you need collections for languages that are not yet on the server, or you want to help us create them, send us an email: quixicon.com/en/contact-us

Collection list

Cards with words, phrases and rules are grouped into collections. The main screen displays a list of all collections.

All cards of the same type (word, phrase, rule) are combined into common collections: «All words», «All phrases» and «All rules».

Click on a collection to open it. A long press will bring up a context menu.


Click on the orange button to start testing:

Top menu:



• Open the main (side) menu
• Create a new empty collection
• Help entry for the current screen
• Collections sorting order

Main Menu:



• Select the studied language and the interface language
• Import ready-made collections from the server
• App information
• Help

Cards

The card is an entry from the dictionary and it includes a word and translation (or a question - answer). It may additionally contain a transcription or the word in a sentence. Flashcards are used to learn words, phrases and rules, and for testing.

For ease of use, cards are divided into 3 types:

• Word
• Phrase
• Rule (universal card with any question, on grammar knowledge for example)

The following card fields are supported:

• Word / phrase / question
• Transcription
• Description / example
• Translation / answer
• Knowledge level (from 0 to 100%)

Working with collections

Inside the collection all cards are shown in a column, like in the dictionary. When you click on them they open in the form of full cards. You can scroll them forward or backward using the left and right arrows or by swiping.

Top Menu:



• Search in the collection
• Add a card manually
• Help
• Cards sorting order

Use the search and sort icons from the top menu to quickly find the words you want within the collection.

Each card has a knowledge level set from 0 to 100%. It changes during testing - for each correct answer Quixicon adds 10%, for the wrong one it takes away the same amount. You can learn more in the “Testing” section.

To view the card, you need to click on it:

Long press on the card will bring up a context menu:



To start testing you need to press the orange button:

Swipe edit

Swipe edit is an alternative way to manage cards in a collection, convenient for bulk copying, deleting, and setting knowledge level. After activating it, you need to select the actions performed when swiping LEFT and RIGHT.



Swiping right is used to copy a card to another collection. Destination collection is chosen by pressing purple field at the top.

Swiping left is used to delete a card or set knowledge level to 0% or 100%.

Testing

You can test your knowledge of words and expressions from any collection. To start testing anywhere in the app, press the orange button:

First, you will need to set the parameters:

• Are you guessing a translation or an original word?
• Do you want split the collection into parts?
• Do you want to limit testing time and the number of words?

To start press the LET\'S GO! button.

You will see a word / phrase / question. Imagine the answer in your mind and touch the eye icon to view the answer.

You will decide if your answer was correct. If it was - swipe the card right, if you were mistaken or just didn’t know – swipe left. There are also buttons at the bottom to use instead of swiping.

Each card has a knowledge level from 0 to 100%. The correct answer increases it by 10%, the wrong answer decreases it. Cards with a 100% rating are not shown in the test (but there’s an option to keep them). It is possible to manually set the level to 100% or reset it back to 0%.

You can exit the test at any time - your answers will still reflect in the statistics.

For complete information about how the app works, see the Help section of the side menu.
Long press on the flashcard to open the context menu

Testing knowledge of words is the main study method

Select a collection, testing parameters and get started.

You will see a word / phrase / question. Imagine the answer in your mind and touch the eye icon to view the answer.

You will decide if your answer was correct. If it was - swipe the card right, if you were mistaken or just didn’t know – swipe left. There are also buttons at the bottom to use instead of swiping.

Testing knowledge of words is the main study method

You will see a word / phrase / question. Imagine the answer in your mind and touch the eye icon to view the answer.

You will decide if your answer was correct. If it was - swipe the card right, if you were mistaken or just didn’t know – swipe left. There are also buttons at the bottom to use instead of swiping.

Testing knowledge of words is the main study method

To get acquainted, we will check the knowledge of 10 words from the starter collection.

What to do?

You will see a word / phrase / question. Imagine the answer in your mind and touch the eye icon to view the answer.

You will decide if your answer was correct. If it was - swipe the card right, if you were mistaken or just didn’t know – swipe left. There are also buttons at the bottom to use instead of swiping.
You can create collections with the words and expressions that you need. Many premade collections are also available.
Want to open a collection from an external link?
We regularly add new collections of words and phrases. Follow us on social networks.
